Step 3: Pick your Subclass

Subclasses change your character's abilities and powers. You can change this anytime in game. Pick the class that sounds the coolest to you.


Solar is a fire-based light class with an emphasis on heat, explosions, and vaporizing your enemies in a blazing inferno.


Arc is an electricity-based light class that enhances your movement and damage output and range very suddenly and unexpectedly.


Void is a gravity/neutron-based light class that allows you to suppress enemies or make solid objects to help defend or attack.
